text: Caribe is a 1987 Canadian adventure thriller movie directed by Michael Kennedy and starring John Savage, Stephen McHattie, Kara Glover, Paul Koslo, Maury Chaykin. ==Other websites== * Category:1987 thriller movies Category:1987 adventure movies Category:Canadian adventure movies Category:Canadian thriller movies Category:Movies about drugs Category:Movies set in Central America
title: Caribe (1987 movie)
